SLMP.​SlmpConfig
public
SLMP.​SlmpConfig

This class is intended to be passed to the `SlmpClient` class. It describes the required configuration for the SLMP client in an abstracted way, which is way better than having them as random attributes scattered around in the `SlmpClient` class.

Properties
Address
public string Address { get; set }

IP address of the target SLMP-compatible device

Port
public int Port { get; set }

The port that SLMP server is configured to run on.

ConnTimeout
public int ConnTimeout { get; set }

Connection timeout.

RecvTimeout
public int RecvTimeout { get; set }

Receive timeout.

SendTimeout
public int SendTimeout { get; set }

Send timeout.

Functions
SlmpConfig
public SlmpConfig(
string address,
int port
)

Initialize a new `SlmpConfig` class
